title: Can't enter lunar revel shop?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hey guys just a quick question, is the lunar revel shop in the same area as where the snowdown skins were? In the linked gyazo you can see the shop is still fully stretched and i can't access it. I have tried repairing the files from the update this morning and nothing has seemed to work
anybody that can help would be greatly appreciated :)

replies.body:
Hey OutKast,

It should be up and running again now.  You might need to log out and back in to see the tab though.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi Outkast,

In the past few minutes we've been working on resolving an issue with the Lunar Revel shop - [keep an eye on the Service Status page for updates and details.](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce)
